title: G-Dragon Announce Rare US Tour Dates in 2025
description: The South Korean superstar will play concerts in Newark, Las Vegas, and Los Angeles this summer. Learn how to get tickets to sold-out dates here. G-Dragon Announce Rare US Tour Dates in 2025 Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: G-DRAGON will play concerts in Newark, Las Vegas, and Los Angeles in summer 2025. Learn how to get tickets to sold-out dates here.
text: South Korean superstar G-DRAGON is bringing his 2025 world tour to the US for six huge shows this summer. As part of his return to the stage after eight years, he’ll play concerts at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey on August 22nd and 23rd; T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas on August 31st; and Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles on September 4th, 5th, and 6th. Tickets went on sale via Ticketmaster beginning Friday, June 27th and a majority of tickets quickly sold out. However, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. Get G-Dragon Here G-Dragon’s 2025 US dates comes as part of an extensive world tour that also includes stops in Australia, Taiwan, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Paris, Japan, and more. Find tickets to the rest of his upcoming dates here. The tour comes in support of G-DRAON’s recently released third studio album, Übermensch, which debuted at No. 1 across South Korea, Japan, and China, and made him first K-pop male artist in 2025 to exceed 200 million digital points on South Korea’s Circle Chart. G-DRAGON’s 2025 US Tour Dates: 08/22 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center [Get Tickets] 08/23 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center [Get Tickets] 08/31 – Las Vegas, NV @ T-Mobile Arena [Get Tickets] 09/04 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets] 09/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets] 09/06 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets] G-DRAGON’s 2025 World Tour Dates: 07/02 – Sydney, Australia @ Qudos Bank Arena 07/03 – Sydney, Australia @ Qudos Bank Arena 07/06 – Melbourne, Australia @ Rod Laver Arena 07/07 – Melbourne, Australia @ Rod Laver Arena 07/11 – Taipei, Taiwan @ Taipei Arena 07/12 – Taipei, Taiwan @ Taipei Arena 07/13 – Taipei, Taiwan @ Taipei Arena 07/19 – Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia @ Axiata Arena Bukit Jalil 07/20 – Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia @ Axiata Arena Bukit Jalil 07/25 – Jakarta, Indonesia @ Indonesia Arena 07/26 – Jakarta, Indonesia @ Indonesia Arena 08/02 – Bangkok, Thailand @ Rajamangala National Stadium 08/09 – Hong Kong @ AsiaWorld-Arena 08/10 – Hong Kong @ AsiaWorld-Arena 08/22 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center 08/31 – Las Vegas, NV @ T-Mobile Arena 09/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena 09/20 – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense Arena
html:
South Korean superstar G-DRAGON is bringing his 2025 world tour to the US for six huge shows this summer. As part of his return to the stage after eight years, he’ll play concerts at Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey on August 22nd and 23rd; T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas on August 31st; and Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles on September 4th, 5th, and 6th.

Tickets went on sale via Ticketmaster beginning Friday, June 27th and a majority of tickets quickly sold out. However, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 110% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program.

Get G-Dragon Here

G-Dragon’s 2025 US dates comes as part of an extensive world tour that also includes stops in Australia, Taiwan, Indonesia, Hong Kong, Paris, Japan, and more. Find tickets to the rest of his upcoming dates here.

The tour comes in support of G-DRAON’s recently released third studio album, Übermensch, which debuted at No. 1 across South Korea, Japan, and China, and made him first K-pop male artist in 2025 to exceed 200 million digital points on South Korea’s Circle Chart.

G-DRAGON’s 2025 US Tour Dates:
08/22 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center [Get Tickets]
08/23 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center [Get Tickets]
08/31 – Las Vegas, NV @ T-Mobile Arena [Get Tickets]
09/04 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets]
09/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets]
09/06 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena [Get Tickets]

G-DRAGON’s 2025 World Tour Dates:

07/03 – Sydney, Australia @ Qudos Bank Arena
07/06 – Melbourne, Australia @ Rod Laver Arena
07/07 – Melbourne, Australia @ Rod Laver Arena
07/11 – Taipei, Taiwan @ Taipei Arena

07/13 – Taipei, Taiwan @ Taipei Arena
07/19 – Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia @ Axiata Arena Bukit Jalil
07/20 – Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia @ Axiata Arena Bukit Jalil
07/25 – Jakarta, Indonesia @ Indonesia Arena
07/26 – Jakarta, Indonesia @ Indonesia Arena
08/02 – Bangkok, Thailand @ Rajamangala National Stadium
08/09 – Hong Kong @ AsiaWorld-Arena
08/10 – Hong Kong @ AsiaWorld-Arena
08/22 – Newark, NJ @ Prudential Center
08/31 – Las Vegas, NV @ T-Mobile Arena
09/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ Crypto.com Arena
09/20 – Paris, France @ Paris La Défense Arena
